languages.text: Что Смерть повстречав, многое тень поняла в течении судеб и через то стала вправе решать, какую обрезать нить. Второй ткач, Избранница Смерти Кибелла, слава ей! Он — есть Смерть.

That the shadow's encounter with Death had taught her many things about the flow of fate's currents, and thus she was now positioned to decide which thread to sever. Second Spinner Kibellah, Death's Chosen One, may she be glorified! He is Death.
languages.original_text: Что Смерть повстречав, многое тень поняла в течении судеб и через то стала вправе решать, какую обрезать нить. Второй ткач, Избранница Смерти Кибелла, слава ей! Он — есть Смерть.

traits.locale_text: That the shadow's encounter with Death had taught her many things about the flow of fate's currents, and thus she was now in a position to decide which thread to sever. Second Weaver Kibellah, Death's Chosen One, may she be glorified! Ayen Kaen Dho.

That the shadow's encounter with Death had taught her many things about the flow of fate's currents, and thus she was now positioned to decide which thread to sever. Second Spinner Kibellah, Death's Chosen One, may she be glorified! He is Death.

languages.text: Dass die Begegnung des Schattens mit dem Tod sie vieles über den Fluss der Strömungen des Schicksals gelehrt hatte und sie daher nun entscheiden konnte, welchen Faden sie durchtrennen musste. Zweite Spinnerin Kibellah, die Auserkorene des Todes, möge sie verherrlicht werden! Er ist der Tod.
languages.original_text: That the shadow's encounter with Death had taught her many things about the flow of fate's currents, and thus she was now positioned to decide which thread to sever. Second Spinner Kibellah, Death's Chosen One, may she be glorified! He is Death.

traits.locale_text: Dass die Begegnung des Schattens mit dem Tod sie vieles über den Fluss der Strömungen des Schicksals gelehrt hatte und sie daher nun entscheiden konnte, welchen Faden sie durchtrennen musste. Zweite Spinnerin Kibellah, die Auserkorene des Todes, möge sie verherrlicht werden! Er ist der Tod.

languages.text: El encuentro de la sombra con la Muerte le había enseñado mucho sobre las corrientes del destino, por lo que estaba en posición de saber qué hilo cortar. ¡Gloria a la Segunda Tejedora Kibellah, elegida de la Muerte! Él es la muerte.
languages.original_text: That the shadow's encounter with Death had taught her many things about the flow of fate's currents, and thus she was now positioned to decide which thread to sever. Second Spinner Kibellah, Death's Chosen One, may she be glorified! He is Death.

traits.locale_text: El encuentro de la sombra con la Muerte le había enseñado mucho sobre las corrientes del destino, por lo que estaba en posición de saber qué hilo cortar. ¡Gloria a la Segunda Tejedora Kibellah, elegida de la Muerte! Él es la muerte.

languages.text: その影は、死との出会いによって運命の流れについて多くのことを学び、どの糸を断ち切るべきかを決める立場になった。第二の織り手キベラ、死に選ばれし者、彼女に栄光あれ！彼は死だ。
languages.original_text: That the shadow's encounter with Death had taught her many things about the flow of fate's currents, and thus she was now positioned to decide which thread to sever. Second Spinner Kibellah, Death's Chosen One, may she be glorified! He is Death.

traits.locale_text: その影は、死との出会いによって運命の流れについて多くのことを学び、どの糸を断ち切るべきかを決める立場になった。第二の織り手キベラ、死に選ばれし者、彼女に栄光あれ！彼は死だ。

languages.text: 她意识到，她与不死之神的相遇，让她对命运的流动有了更深层次的理解。她已经得到了智慧，有权决定该切断哪些丝线。荣耀归于次席织网者绮贝菈，不死之神的神选者！祂便是死亡本身。
languages.original_text: That the shadow's encounter with Death had taught her many things about the flow of fate's currents, and thus she was now positioned to decide which thread to sever. Second Spinner Kibellah, Death's Chosen One, may she be glorified! He is Death.

traits.locale_text: 她意识到，她与不死之神的相遇，让她对命运的流动有了更深层次的理解。她已经得到了智慧，有权决定该切断哪些丝线。荣耀归于次席织网者绮贝菈，不死之神的神选者！祂便是死亡本身。

languages.text: Que la rencontre de l'ombre avec la Mort lui avait appris beaucoup de choses sur les courants du destin, et qu'elle était désormais en mesure de décider quel fil couper. Deuxième tisseuse Kibellah, élue de la Mort, qu'elle soit glorifiée ! Il incarne la mort.
languages.original_text: That the shadow's encounter with Death had taught her many things about the flow of fate's currents, and thus she was now positioned to decide which thread to sever. Second Spinner Kibellah, Death's Chosen One, may she be glorified! He is Death.

traits.locale_text: Que la rencontre de l'ombre avec la Mort lui avait appris beaucoup de choses sur les courants du destin, et qu'elle était désormais en mesure de décider quel fil couper. Deuxième tisseuse Kibellah, élue de la Mort, qu'elle soit glorifiée ! Il incarne la mort.

languages.text: Gölgenin Ölüm'le karşılaşmasının kendisine kaderin akışına dair nice şeyler öğrettiğini, bundandır ki artık hangi ipliği koparacağına karar verebilme mertebesine getirildiğini söyledi. Ölüm'ün Seçilmişi olan İkinci Dokur Kibellah, yüceler arasında yer alsın. O Ölüm'dür.
languages.original_text: That the shadow's encounter with Death had taught her many things about the flow of fate's currents, and thus she was now positioned to decide which thread to sever. Second Spinner Kibellah, Death's Chosen One, may she be glorified! He is Death.
